ygData.subject: RE: Charm after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats a shame then.  I was really hoping that the patch made special instruments give a bonus to our songs.  Guess we can hope that something didn t go right
ygData.messageBody:
Thats a shame then. I was really hoping that the patch made special
instruments give a bonus to our songs. Guess we can hope that something
didn't go right with the patch and that Verant will fix it. One thing I
will test the next time I get the chance is the Carillon song with a Mino
horn against a mob that is KOS to me. With a normal flute, you can't
improve your faction high enough to get out of the KOS range (according to
this list). Maybe with a magical Mino horn, you can now raise KOS mobs to
dubious or apprehensive.

Kinda wish our instruments used 1HB skill instead of hand to hand. I've
never used a 1HB weapon before and need to work on that skill:-)


Galtin of E'ci


> I think that's why they made our instruments magical. They
> could make our punches magical via magical gloves, but having
> a non-magical instrument equipped overrode that. So I think
> they fixed it by just making all our instruments magical, then
> made a big deal about it in the patch message.
>
>
